properties.entry: SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , USER_ID , COUNT , CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER ON (NOTICE_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , NOTICE_WRITER ) VALUES ( SEQ_NNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )
